REUTERS.UNKNOWN: CQ MQ f1505 reute u f BC-scrap-copper 04-07 0042

TEXT.TITLE: SCRAP COPPER QUOTED AT NOMINAL 51.50 CENTS
TEXT.BODY:
Dealers quoted No.2 scrap copper at a nominal 51.50 cents up 0.50 cents from Monday. Refiners were willing to pay some 2.00 cents above that level for premium lots of scrap.
Reuter
